amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Drew University Environmental Science Initiative of Drew University, Madison, New Jersey, and to decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration cross agency support by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 85 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use for the Drew University Environmental Science Initiative of Drew University, Madison, New Jersey, and decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration cross agency support by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 318 (Roll no. 380).
